name: Duckton Declares: The Referendum!
description:
On Thursday 23rd of June 2016, the UK has a big decision to make: Should they remain a member of the EU, or leave it and likely never return?

Duckton Declares: The Referendum attempts to simulate a process that'll start at 10PM on the day, where people up and down the country will be given the task of tallying the votes cast. Given one hundred votes to pile up, how quickly and accurately can you count them?

With the polls also too close to call, Duckton Declares: The Referendum also acts as the world's most unscientific result prediction system. Which way will the one hundred votes fall for you?

Pause/Unpause is bound to escape on the keyboard.

In the PC version, Escape on the Main Menu will close the game.
